articles.author: Benn Stancil
articles.title: A method for measuring analytical work
articles.summary: How do you measure the success of the analytical practices? The fact that the feedback loop for a business decision is long and often can't assess the counterfactual, is it still makes sense to measure the analytical practice by the outcome?

articles.author: Twitter
articles.title: Forecasting SQL query resource usage with machine learning
articles.summary: One of the challenges of data infrastructure is to balance the query performance and the cost. Twitter writes an exciting blog narrating how machine learning-driven optimization is on top of Presto to optimize resource usage.

articles.author: Confluent
articles.title: The Future of SQL - Databases Meet Stream Processing
articles.summary: SQL is a powerful language that allows us to express complex questions of our data with ease. How does SQL adopt not only the data at rest but also for the streaming data? The article narrates how the push vs. pull query execution changes the query complexity from O(number of records in input table) vs. O(rate of table change).

articles.author: Ryan Gross
articles.title: Designing Data Platforms to Harness the Power of Fog Computing
articles.summary: The modern data stack predominately focused on the concept of a LakeHouse architecture. It takes the best attributes from traditional data warehouses and runs on platforms with data lake storage architectures. On following Confluent's thoughts on streaming SQL, the author raised great questions on the role of Fog computing in the modern data platform.

articles.author: StarTree
articles.title: What makes Apache Pinot fast?
articles.summary: StarTree writes about why Pinot is fast, explaining various indexing & multi-model support. JSON indexing to support semi-structured data analysis, aggregation optimization using star tree indexing are some of the highlights to read.

articles.author: Qonto
articles.title: Scaling Airflow on Kubernetes - lessons learned
articles.summary: Qonto shares its experience scaling Airflow on Kubernetes. The pod template files to optimize the resource consumption for the sensor & task operators, monitoring the lifecycle of a task & cluster elasticity are some of the exciting reads.

articles.author: Meltwater
articles.title: Our Journey from Database to Data Lake
articles.summary: Meltwater writes about its journey to adopt the data lake from a single database for the reporting solution. The cost comparison matrix is a fascinating study that shows S3 + Athena is 6X cost-efficient than the RDS solution.

articles.author: Leev’s
articles.title: A Practical Guide for Kafka Cost Reduction
articles.summary: A great read on practical tips on reducing the Kafka infrastructure cost, focus AWS instance type, compression, rake aware consumers to fetch data from closest replica, cluster rebalancing & cluster tuning configurations.
